data.text: The word that Isaiah the son of Amoz saw concerning Judah and Jerusalem.
And it shall come to pass in the last days,
And many people shall go and say,
And he shall judge among the nations,
O house of Jacob, come ye,
Therefore thou hast forsaken thy people the house of Jacob,
Their land also is full of silver and gold,
Their land also is full of idols;
And the mean man boweth down,
Enter into the rock, and hide thee in the dust,
The lofty looks of man shall be humbled,
For the day of the Lord of hosts shall be upon every one that is proud and lofty,
And upon all the cedars of Lebanon, that are high and lifted up,
And upon all the high mountains,
And upon every high tower,
And upon all the ships of Tarshish,
And the loftiness of man shall be bowed down,
And the idols he shall utterly abolish.
And they shall go into the holes of the rocks,
In that day a man shall cast his idols of silver, and his idols of gold,
To go into the clifts of the rocks,
Cease ye from man, whose breath is in his nostrils:
